content.title: Sanatorio Colegiales
content.paragraph: During my collaboration on the web project for Sanatorio Colegiales in Argentina, I implemented banners designed in Adobe Illustrator, ensuring visual fidelity on the web. Additionally, I developed dynamic routes for efficient navigation, an internationalization system, and managed advanced forms. I also optimized images to improve site performance and speed.

content.title: Importaciones Printec
content.paragraph: I developed a mobile application for Importaciones Printec that optimized their operations by including client visualization, digital contract management, secure authentication with differentiated roles, and automated billing with direct invoice sending via email and PDF download.

content.title: Creative Tools
content.paragraph: In the development of Creative Tools, I created a web application to store and share useful resources for developers and designers. The platform allows users to register and share resources, features a scoring and favorites system, and provides intuitive organization into modules, resources, and documentation. It also includes advanced filtering for personalized searches and a reporting system for community maintenance.

left.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with a special focus on frontend development. My fascination with technology has led me to explore various areas of computer science, from programming to security and video games.

In my freelance career, I have worked on a variety of projects ranging from dynamic website development to hybrid mobile applications. I am proud to have completed six semesters of Systems Engineering, and everything else I have learned is self-taught, demonstrating my ability to adapt and quickly learn new technologies.
